Title: basename
Description: Extracts the tail of a string following its last slash or backslash. This function if often used to extract the filename from a path.
expr — A value of type String. Backslashes must be escaped.

The tail of the input string after its last slash or backslash. If the input string ends with a slash or backslash (e.g. / or c:\), the function returns an empty string.The original string if there are no slashes or backslashes.
